LanguageData.CaravanAI.label: caravan
LanguageData.ClimateBombSite.label: 气候炸弹位置
LanguageData.SiegeCampSite.label: 围攻者基地
LanguageData.SiegeCampSite.description: 这是敌人营地。他们将轰炸我们的定居点并会发起突袭，直到我们将其摧毁。
LanguageData.FriendlySettlementHelp.label: 遇袭友军基地
LanguageData.FriendlySettlementHelp.description: 其敌对派系将在不久后袭击该基地，帮忙守住袭击，你会得到荣誉与奖赏。
LanguageData.DoomsdayUltimatumCamp.label: 末日武器位置
LanguageData.DoomsdayUltimatumCamp.description: 这是拥有未知武器的派系所在地。
LanguageData.QuestPlace.label: 任务地点
LanguageData.ConcantrationCamp.label: 集中营
LanguageData.ConcantrationCamp.description: 集中营\n被海盗控制的人质极可能在此处
LanguageData.FairPlace.label: Fair
LanguageData.FairPlace.description: You were invited to a fair where there will be a lot of traders (from factions whose relations are either neutral or friendly).
LanguageData.CompetitionsPlace.label: Competitions
LanguageData.MassBurialPlace.label: Mass burial
LanguageData.PlaceBattle.label: Place of battle
